value.description: Allentown is losing another police chief. Glenn E. Granitz Jr., who has served as Allentown’s police chief since Sept. 2019, has accepted the same position in West Reading, Berks County. Granitz will become part of a crowded field of ex-chiefs who have left the job for a variety of reasons.

value.name: So just where did Christopher Columbus come from? Scientists try to find out
value.description: Was Christopher Columbus really from Genoa, in Italy? Or was he Spanish? Or, as some other theories have it, was he Portuguese or Croatian or even Polish? A definitive answer to the question of where the famous explorer came from could be just five months away as international scientists on Wednesday launched an effort to read the DNA from his remains and identify his geographic origin.

value.name: More than 50 years before George Floyd's death, lawmakers predicted a growing racial divide
value.description: It's been a year since George Floyd's chilling last words, "I can't breathe," sent shock waves around the world. A guilty verdict came down April 20, but Black Americans had no time to celebrate the rare occurrence of a White police officer being convicted of the murder of a Black man.
